name: 王聖銘
objective: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service to improve its quality and the interaction between service providers and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is understanding the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that they can create user-friendly, competitive, and relevant services. Service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course to discuss the developments and applications of interactive technologies in various scenarios and application fields.
